verify-phase.description: Verification hook with drift detection - compares implementation to design doc before phase transitions
verify-phase.usage: Invoke before transitioning between rough-draft phases (interface, pseudocode, skeleton, implementation)

collab-cleanup.description: Cleanup hook for completed collabs - copies artifacts to docs/designs/ and optionally deletes collab folder
collab-cleanup.usage: Invoke after implementation is complete to graduate design artifacts and clean up the collab folder
